General.Name: Zhejiang Xinhua Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Xinhua Chemical Co.,Ltd manufactures and trades in various chemicals and chemical raw material in China and internationally. The company offers fatty amines, organic solvents, flavors, hydrogen peroxide organic amine series, inorganic chemicals, and custom chemicals. It also offers aroma chemicals, such as turpentine oil derivatives, sandal series, ester series, and others flame retardants; and peroxide series, synthetic ammonia, and other fine chemicals. Zhejiang Xinhua Chemical Co.,Ltd was formerly known as Jiande City Xinhua Chemical Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Zhejiang Xinhua Chemical Co.,Ltd in June 2008. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Jiande, China.
